心流 ｜陳芳蘭 陶藝個展 
Flow｜Fang-Lan, Chen Solo exhibition 

這幾件作品，我非常喜歡。
它們貼近我心裡想要的那份真實與安然。
— 陳芳蘭

作品裡埋著手指的捏痕，
線條沒有被強求去對稱，
而是順著當下的感覺慢慢推開。

表面那些焦黑與斑駁，
是柴燒後入炭所留下的印記。
火焰、灰與礦物在高溫裡相印堆疊，
呈現了岩層與焦痕的質感。
看起來粗獷，卻有一種難以言說的溫暖。

近看能看到肌理的深淺，
像風化的石頭，
沉穩、安然,
如土，如息。

I hold these pieces close to my heart.
They come closest to the sense of truth and calm I hope to express.
— Fang Lan Chen

The traces of my fingers remain within the clay,
each line shaped not by symmetry,
but by the slow rhythm of hand building.

The dark and mottled surfaces
are marks left by carbon introduced after the wood firing.
Flame, ash, and minerals layered together in the heat,
creating textures that recall stone and charred earth.
They may appear rough,
yet carry a quiet warmth that feels deeply human.

Up close, the surface reveals shifting grains,
like weathered stone,
steady, grounded,
earth like, breathing.
